SPOILER ALERT.Definition: a warning that the next information might ruin a surprise or give away important details

SCRAMBLING.Definition: trying to do it in a hurry

SANDWICHED.Definition: placed between, in a tight or pressured space

CAUTIOUS.Definition: careful to avoid danger or mistakes

NOMADIC.Definition: moving from place to place without a permanent home

PROTECTORATE.Definition: a country controlled and protected by a more powerful country

OUTSOURCE.Definition: get the services from an outside source, from another country

SUBSISTENCE LIFESTYLE.Definition: a way of living where people had just enough to survive

OUTLINED.Definition: explained in a general or basic way

CLARIFIED.Definition: made it clearer or easier to understand

SETTLED.Definition: gone to live or taken up residence

MILITANTS.Definition: people who used strong or violent actions to support their cause

BY DEFAULT.Definition: happening because no other option was chosen

ABBREVIATION.Definition: a short form of the phrase

ARABLE.Definition: land that is good for growing crops

CAMEL.Definition: a large animal with humps on its back, used for transport in desert areas

TRIBE.Definition: a group of people who shared the same culture, language, or history

MAINSTREAM.Definition: what was accepted by most people

TANGIBLE.Definition: something real that they could touch or see

MARGINALISED.Definition: pushed to the side and treated as less important

BUREAUCRACY.Definition: a system of government that has many complicated rules and processes

SINGLED OUT.Definition: chosen or picked from the rest

IN THE SLIGHTEST.Definition: not even a little, not at all

UNDERCLASS.Definition: the lowest social group, often poor and disadvantaged

JARRING.Definition: shocking or unpleasant in an unexpected way

BIAS.Definition: a preference for one thing over another, in an unfair way

MARGINALISING.Definition: treating them as less important or pushed aside

PRIZED.Definition: valued highly or considered very important

LIMBO.Definition: a state of uncertainty or waiting

BUREAUCRATIC.Definition: related to complicated rules and processes of the government
